name: Mirror
baseMeaning: A mirror, used for reflection and seeing oneself.
tldr: Mirror mirror! Used for self-reflection, selfies, or revealing truth.

contextMeanings.meaning: An actual mirror or looking at oneself.
contextMeanings.example: Got a new mirror for my room
Time to take a hard look

contextMeanings.meaning: Calling out hypocrisy or suggesting someone look at themselves.

Common for calling out hypocrisy or self-reflection.
Popular in GRWM and mirror selfie content.
